technical_points: No monthly fee for existing customers

confirm.heading: Application via Brokers only
confirm.description: B2Bfinance.com are registered intermediaries who will quote, package and submit your lending request to Natwest. There is no charge for this service as we are paid a small commission by Natwest to cover our time.

data.title: Precise Oh So Precise Total Winners Deal
data.description: Whether your landlord is a first time buyer, a first time landlord or has a large portfolio, we have a range of products to help. Our range of mortgages also includes products for Limited Companies and HMOs.
technical_points: Rental cover - ICR: based on individual circumstances
5 year fixed rate products that help maximise the loan size available
5 year fixed with 4% cashback available on purchases
